bp back post chain chain double_crochet double_crochet sl-st slip_stitch treble_crochet treble_crochet hints are typed in italics and coloured purple they are to help and guide you and hopefully make life a little easier especially for beginners reference to photos is p with the relevant photo number * * repeat instructions between asterisks the amount of times specified this is normally a repeat for a complete side and will consist of multiple instructions repeat instructions between parentheses the amount of times specified this is a lower level repeat special stitches treble_crochet-popcorn make 5 treble_crochet in same st remove hook from loop and insert from front to back of 1st treble_crochet and then into dropped loop and pull through chain 1 to close this closing chain is not counted in any chains you are asked to make after the popcorn note corner chain spaces are not included in any st count original design by helen shrimpton ♥ copyright © 2015 ♥ all rights reserved 1 starting with a magic_ring chain 4 counts as double_crochet plus chain-1 double_crochet chain 1 11 times join to 3rd chain fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 12 double_crochet 12 chain-1 2 join
